title: LF JNG TeGC
body:
Looking for a Jungle for our team, Truth Gaming Corps.

Must be Bronze or Silver.

I have personally captained a team in seasons 5 that reached Gold IV with 33 wins 0 Losses, but because of the new Dynamic Queue we can no longer play together, so looking to rebuild from scratch!

-Must have some knowledge of jungle matchups.
-Must have good map awareness.
-Must be proficient on at least 5 different champions.

----------------------------

Summoner Name:
Position:
Season 5 Rank:
Current Rank:
Current MMR:
Top Five Champs:
Why do you want to be in a team:

---------------------------------

Please leave these details below.

replies.body:
Summoner Name: Benquinn5/Profaniity/carebearkillerzz
Position: jg
Season 5 Rank: Unknown/silver2/gold4
Current Rank: silver 3
Current MMR: 1489/1361/1228
Top Five Champs:  yi/jax/morde/voli/rammus
Why do you want to be in a team: Want to play with people who are dedicated, want to win and have fun.
How easily can you pick up a new champ?
Within a few games, add me on my main, Profaniity
Do you have an account that is bronze/silver so that you can queue with the team?
hey sorry dude, i should really check the forums alot more aha... position has been filled sorry! but would be keen to add you and play sometime?

How easily can you pick up a new champ?
